item.title: stats2- anova
item.description: ANOVA and regression are the same, the lm() function is useful mod <- aov(total.score ~ venue, afl.majors) This is the Anova function from the car package Anova(mod) Posthoc pairwise comparisons with conservative bonferroni BUT problematic because you didn’t have a hypothesis about what you were looking for posthocPairwiseT(mod, p.adjust.method = "bonferroni")
